duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and drive the daily operations of a team of hourly Ambassadors.
Ensure policy and procedures are conducted with the highest levels of security and integrity.
Manage day-to-day operations of a team of Ambassadors that utilize technology to perform duties related to airport security, customer service, and sales.
Support an open and exciting work environment that motivates all team members, fostering creativity, innovation, and advancement.
Coach, mentor, and train the team to meet sales and customer service goals and standards.
Analyze key metrics, customer feedback, and direct observations to make informed decisions on how to improve team performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
